doc.title: Young Men in a Hurry
doc.plot: The Kingston trio portraying recent college graduates who are close friends and roommates, the three trade on their status as members of the Junior Chamber of Commerce to play music together as a means of making extra money."Oh Miss Mary" and "Goin' Away For To Leave You" are featured, along with the Trio staple "Coplas!" and the unreleased John Stewart theme song, "Young Men in a Hurry."
